attributes.action: Bring State Pension To 63 years of age ,Bring it Down From 65 Years Age To 63
attributes.additional_details: We want a pension fit for purpose that takes pensioners off means testing, allows enough money to ‘Eat and Heat’ without constantly worrying.And enjoying them selves
attributes.background: To bring the Basic State Pension to a level that lifts pensioners out of poverty Early.Bring the age down where many people can enjoy they pension and have good time
